attributes.action: We demand an outright ban on Conversion Therapy defined by many as torture
attributes.additional_details: This is cruel and has lead to large numbers of people taking their own lives
attributes.background: Kath Duncan Equality and  Civil Rights Network call  on the Government to support UN and the  LGBTQ community across the Uk to ban in law in all its forms  Conversion Therapy, that is widely accepted as torture and is in breach of international law on the rights of the LGBTQ community

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300976
